andromeda.why: Refuses coerced service; rest and consent precede any bargain.

arcturus.why: Sets recovery and workload limits—willpower regulation and pacing.

draco.why: Guilt-pressure to keep producing to prove loyalty/value.

lyra.why: This is will/rest hygiene, not an aesthetic axis.

orion-dark.why: Duty-as-control: ‘you owe the tribe’ scripts override consent.

orion-light.why: Discipline to stand down and recover before honorable service.

pleiades.why: Attunes to care economy—rest sustains trustworthy provision.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching stewardship; no formal covenant transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Insists on freely chosen work; sovereign yes/no to service.

arcturus.why: Defines fair terms, scope, and exchange—clean bargain protocol.

draco.why: Loyalty tests around overwork and unlimited availability.

lyra.why: Courteous, clear tone makes agreements receivable.

orion-light.why: Honorable commitment: do what you promised, no more/no less.

pleiades.why: Mutual care—resources flow where bonds are respected.

sirius.why: Practical contracting; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after over-giving or coerced obligation.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—swings between martyring and withdrawal while calibrating.

draco.why: Dominance via guilt and ‘prove your worth’ labor.

lyra.why: Provider image management substitutes for real terms.

orion-dark.why: Canonized duty myths used to extract unpaid service.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—admit misreads, reset the bargain cleanly.

pleiades.why: Enmeshment/appeasement to keep bonds warm at self-cost.

sirius.why: Self-forging of will and terms; no law transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Defends consent in community deals; no coerced generosity.

arcturus.why: Codifies clean tribal exchange—roles, limits, rest/reward cycles.

draco.why: Guards the commons from freeloaders and predatory extraction.

lyra.why: Dignified, plain style makes norms easy to adopt.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy risk—rules over life if over-fixed.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-conduct—deliver what you promise, rest when done.

pleiades.why: Structures reciprocity so bonds feel safe and nourished.

sirius.why: Covenant protocol—teaches fair-exchange law by example.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda that the ‘good one’ must provide endlessly.

arcturus.why: Projected as universal provider → burnout/scapegoat when refusing bad deals.

draco.why: Status games over who sacrifices most for the tribe.

lyra.why: Iconic steadiness—quiet, trustworthy presence without theater.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine of duty used to compel unpaid, unending labor.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—honor the bargain, not the crowd.

pleiades.why: Placating others by over-giving to keep harmony.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: ethical provision under pressure and myth.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from guilt-bonds; restores voluntary exchange.

arcturus.why: Elder stewardship: work/rest doctrine, contract reviews, sunset clauses.

draco.why: Guards boundaries so strength is not harvested by force.

lyra.why: Plain, dignified standard becomes cultural signal for fair dealing.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing duty into hierarchy rather than service to life.

orion-light.why: Warrior oath kept cleanly—serve the covenant, not spectacle.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards of exchange, not soothing at this altitude.

sirius.why: Covenant sage—teaches the law of fair exchange and rightful rest by embodied example.
